1.title: Tem Lagarto Nessa Terra
1.plot: "Are there lizards in this land?" - Erick lives in the city and wonders if there are lizards in his great-uncle's farm. His grandmother, Maria, takes him there, where he finds sheep, rides a horse, and picks potatoes and tea.

2.title: O laçador e o Bananal
2.plot: "The lasso and the banana" - The rodeo starts, Andrigo and his grandfather are going to compete together. Andrigo misses his lasso, but his grandfather ties a calf and they celebrate. Later, his grandmother takes him to visit his great-grandfather to learn where bananas come from.

3.title: Uma Aldeia Kaingang
3.plot: "A Kaingang village" - Yuri lives with his grandparents, members of the Kaingang tribe who preserve their traditions. Yuri helps his grandmother gather firewood and weave baskets. Grandpa Dorvalino studies in the university and teaches in the village. Together they made ash bread, one of their tribe's special recipes.

4.title: Um, dois, três: Gravando
4.plot: "One, two, three: rolling!" - Milena plays TV reporter and interviews her grandfather João. He shows her the creek where he used to bathe, and together they pick vegetables, explore the old tool shed, and make pasta.

5.title: Férias no Assentamento
5.plot: "Vacation on the settlement" - Cauã loves spending his vacations with his grandparents, in a Landless Workers Movement settlement. There he plays with lots of friends, goes fishing with his grandmother, visits the cooperative where his grandfather works, plays on his bike and rides a horse.

6.title: A Imaginação da vovó
6.plot: "Grandma's imagination" - Grandma Elci tells a ghost story from her childhood, and her granddaughter Mel decides to walk past the same place. It's a dirt road where the pebbles hit your ankles, coming from some mysterious place.

7.title: O Curioso e a Casa de Pedra
7.plot: "The curious boy and the stone house" - Henrique explores and is frightened by what he finds in his grandparents' basement. His curiosity leads him to learn about grape vines with his grandfather Domingos, to a grape juice factory, and to an Italian kitchen.

8.title: O que este rio tem para contar?
8.plot: "What story does this river tell?" - Kauani and her grandfather go visit the family's old property, now flooded by a dam. This is when Kauani learns about the Dam Victims' Movement and sees how her grandfather was important in the fight for land rights.

9.title: O que as fotografias podem contar?
9.plot: "What can photographs tell us?" - Pedro lives in the same city as his grandparents, in the mountains of Rio Grande do Sul. They decide to go on a day trip: see the house where grandpa lived as a child, and the school he studied in. To mark the occasion, they get their photo taken dressed like old German immigrants.

10.title: Parecido e Diferente
10.plot: "Same but different" - Malu and Luma are twins, but they aren't the same. Daughters of a fandango master and an actress, the girls live surrounded by Parana's caiçara culture. They play, dance and learn with grandma Arieta a new way to make music: playing the spoon.

11.title: A Trança e o Colar
11.plot: "The braid and the necklace" - Victória likes to play school. Angélica, her mother, likes making Afro-Brazilian braids on her and her client's hair in the salon where she works. The two of them go with her grandmother Hosana to see a quilombo and learn about their roots.

12.title: Tropeiros carregam histórias
12.plot: "Troopers carry stories" - Many and her great-grandmother Donária become troopers for a day: they prepare farofa, ride mules and stop to eat in the shade. Back home, they dance a waltz like in the old days. This was how great-grandma met great-grandpa, who used to be a trooper and explored the Cambará mountains.

13.title: Um passeio de barco
13.plot: "Stories from the sea" - Grandpa Domingos was a fisherman, but his son didn't follow in his steps and now owns an auto parts store in the city. His grandsons Nicoli and Ítalo plan to go fishing together to hear about their family's past adventures.

imdb.plot outline: A child's journey with their grandparents in search oh their roots, where they explore the past to reflect on the reasons why their family moved to a new city. The series playfully shows the different cultures inside Brazil that color the children's world, presenting a mosaic of various Brazilian ethinicities and cultural backgrounds. Mysterious Glimpses will touch all families with the life stories of different generations, sharing knowledge and connecting the past to the future.
imdb.title: Mistérios de Entrever
plot: A child's journey with their grandparents in search oh their roots, where they explore the past to reflect on the reasons why their family moved to a new city. The series playfully shows the different cultures inside Brazil that color the children's world, presenting a mosaic of various Brazilian ethinicities and cultural backgrounds.
